list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a fine-grained gray, green, or bluish metamorphic rock easily split into smooth, flat pieces.
a flat piece of slate used for writing on, typically framed in wood, formerly used in schools.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the teacher was demonstrating, the children copying onto slates
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Giáo viên đã chứng minh, những đứa trẻ sao chép trên các trò chơi

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: cover (something, especially a roof) with slates.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he was working for his father slating a new roof
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ấy đã làm việc cho cha anh ấy đã cắt một mái nhà mới
